Hi all, 

I am currently working on auto generation of test cases for TDD f=
or 
my honors year project. And was considering modifying JUnit such 
that =
it will auto generate some test cases based values flagged by 
users. 

E.g=
., 
Public boolean isLegalInt(int x){ 
/* input - 0 < x < 10, result - True=
*/

}
given a comment like the above will generate assert statements such 
=
as
assertFalse(isLegalInt(0));
assertTrue(isLegalInt(1));
assertTrue(isLega=
lInt(9));
assertFalse(isLegalInt(10));

Thus, I am trying to locate the sou=
rce code that generates the 
testclass template to implement the changes an=
d I can't seem to find 
it anywhere. Any help would be greatly appreciated =
thankyou.
